title: Coffee is now a symbol of Germany's immigration debate
text:
Coffee is now a symbol of Germany's immigration debate 12:49pm EDT - 01:48 
Syrians who fled the civil war into Germany have been outraged by a far-right politician's photograph of himself drinking coffee in a Syrian city, claiming it was safe enough to deport the migrants.   
Syrians who fled the civil war into Germany have been outraged by a far-right politician's photograph of himself drinking coffee in a Syrian city, claiming it was safe enough to deport the migrants.  //reut.rs/2ph43e0
